finances.setupBudgetMessage: Complete the following steps to manage your budget:
finances.stepAMessage: Add your monthly income (salary, benefits, etc.)
finances.stepBMessage: Add your fixed monthly expenses (rent, insurance, etc.)
finances.stepCMessage: Create budget pots for variable expenses (groceries, clothing, etc.)
finances.stepDMessage: Choose which day of the month your budget should reset
finances.onboardingComplete: Onboarding complete! You can now manage your budget.
finances.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
